direction.description: 'row' or 'col' which will define the Axis for placing children. Defaults to row.

fillParent.description: Whether the element fills the parent or not

mainAxisAlignment.description: 'start', 'end', 'center', 'spaceBetween', 'spaceAround' or 'spaceEvenly' which will define the main axis alignment of children. Defaults to start.

crossAxisAlignment.description: 'start', 'end', 'center', 'stretch' or 'baseline' which will define the cross axis alignement of children. Defaults to start.

scroll.description: Whether the element should be scrollable or not.
